item.title: Receiving a Letter of Recommendation
item.description: If you are reading this, you are either thinking about or have asked me to write you a letter of recommendation.

item.title: Considering Plan D: Data Science After Academia
item.description: This week I gave an invited talk as a part of the Australian Music and Psychology Society’s Amplify Your Research speaker series.
